name: apple
description: A round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish flesh.

name: banana
description: A long curved fruit with a yellow skin.

name: carrot
description: A long, orange vegetable with a sweet taste.

name: dog
description: A domesticated carnivorous mammal with a snout, sharp teeth, and a bark or howl.

name: elephant
description: A large mammal with a long trunk, large ears, and tusks.

name: football
description: A round ball used in the sport of football (soccer).

name: guitar
description: A stringed musical instrument with a wooden body and a long neck.

name: house
description: A building where people live, typically containing rooms, and often with a roof and walls.

name: ice cream
description: A frozen dessert made from cream or milk, sugar, and flavorings.

name: jacket
description: A short coat with sleeves, worn outdoors.
